content: प्रवृत्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Begun, commenced, proceeded with. {@--2@} Set in; अचिरप्रवृत्तं ग्रीष्मसमयमधिकृत्य <ls>Ś. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Engaged in, occupied with. {@--4@} Going to, bound for. {@--5@} Fixed, settled, determined. {@--6@} Unimpeded, undisputed. {@--7@} Round. --त्तः A round ornament. --त्तं An action, undertaking.
